review_blob: Bitter enough, you can taste malt and a bit of sweetness in this beer. A strong beer that does not overtake your mouth. To bee served cooler than the ambiant temperature but not too cold !

Balance is the word to describe this beer. Not too bitter, not a too strong personality, but still has a distinctive taste. Probably one of the beer that delivers the most for the price. Quite affordable, this beer fits any kind of occasion : during a hot day of summer, eating ribs on a terrasse, watching the hockey game or to bring at a friends party.... my "everyday" kind of beer...
